review_data.title: Good food and service
review_data.content: Ordered Take Away meals by phone, directly from the restaurant (vs.via Eats.ch). Food arrived promptly and hot. Received a complimentary 50cl bottle of wine and salad too! Have dined in this restaurant multiple times and had good experience as well. Prices are reasonable for Zurich.
